ignore.reason: The div element represents a full-width-of-page line in a document extract; not a thematic break.
Double spaces required to represent elided words in a very broken letter.
Lower case letter follows break/elision after sentence boundary.
Punctuation missing in broken letter context.
Multiple em-dashes used to pad length of elision in broken letter context.
Text breaks off in broken context, so no full-stop.
LoI entry matches ALT text rather than figcaption text which is not appropriate for identifying image.
